content: I operate in the lifestyle and wellness industry, focusing on fitness, self-care, and personal development. I usually post a mix of educational, inspirational, and personal content. My target audience is like-minded individuals who are interested in improving their overall well-being. As for goals, I'd like to increase engagement and attract new followers over the next month. I'm open to exploring different themes and ideas, but I'd like to focus on consistency and using relevant hashtags to reach a wider audience.
